column2: we ordered the Chicken Tangri
column3: Barra Chicken and Afghani Kebabs and waited to it to be ready. I stared at the giant board that said Rajinder Xpress and everything did seem as quick as the word Xpress signifies. It was mystifying to see that all this started with a roadside stall and has converted to one of the most popular North Indian joints in Delhi.There were men working furiously to cater to the needs of the people in the area. 1409565518 5404435d0d0cee62bd654fca 427958 791124 28 "Kashish Yadav" https://www.zomato.com/users/kashish-yadav-427958 "My friends from college and i decided to go here since we heard the food was very good. They have a restaurant and a take away place. The place was so crowded at the take away counter that we had to fight our way to place and collect our order. Things must be more peaceful in the restaurant. they have a few tables spread in a shack like place to have the food outdoors. We decided to have there since its cheaper than the menu in the restaurant.The chicken curry and the non veg platter is the biggest hit in our dinner. Chicken curry had a very special uncommon flavour. Highly recommended. the kebabs and chicken grills were also good. All this made our butter chicken taste 'just normal'.Overall it was a really good experience. Good quantity and taste for the money. Value for money guaranteed. Will visit again to try out their other delicacies. We have just covered 5% of their extensive menu. I can't really comment about the Veg part since I did not have any and am not planning to have." 1777 "2014-05-23 18:45:23" 6 Legendary https://www.zomato.com/review/EkLrr  1400850923.0

column2: hence thought of reviewing. I guess the menu card has changed as the items I had isn't exactly the same as per the new menu.Me and my friend went here for a casual dinner going by the name of the place and close vicinity to friend's campus (JNU). We ordered Achari Murg Tikka (I guess we had half a plate containing 6 pieces) and Murg Tangri Kebab for starters. Both the items had authentic Punjabi flavour and the spice of Delhi. Achari tikka was spicy and very appetizing to the hungry stomach. Tangri Kebab was also tasty and we finished with these in no time. For the main course we ordered one full Gosht Rarah Punjabi (Mutton) and Butter Naan. Again the mutton was amazingly tasty and very well cooked. I had to help my friend in finishing with the mutton as she was almost full with the starters.All in all the food befits the name of the dhaba.Food - 4.2/5Ambience - 3.8/5Service -...read more" 1777 "2013-09-17 01:09:42" 24  https://www.zomato.com/review/YbmBz 3 1379360382.0
